meanings.sent1: The fairgoers enjoyed the rides and games at the fair.
meanings.sent2: Many fairgoers visited the petting zoo during the fair.
meanings.sent3: The fairgoers laughed as they tried to win stuffed animals at the fair games.
meanings.sent4: The fairgoers were like bees buzzing around the fairgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The happy fairgoers made the fair atmosphere lively and fun.

meanings.definition: Those who go to a fair.
meanings.sent1: We saw the fairgoers walking towards the entrance of the fair.
meanings.sent2: The fairgoers bought cotton candy and popcorn at the fair.
meanings.sent3: The fairgoers chatted excitedly about which rides to try first at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The fairgoers were a colorful crowd moving through the fairgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The group of fairgoers added to the festive spirit of the fair.
